Entries.Wed6: #$1 pierre1#*sigh*... No matter how well the business does, it's never enough to satisfy my desire for success. What's wrong with me? Maybe I'm just too ambitious for my own good.$s#$e#Unfortunately, business is so slow I can hardly save any money... what am I going to tell Caroline?$s
Entries.Thu8: #$1 pierre2#Don't tell my wife, but I actually hate cooking. I still do it though - it helps take the stress off her.
Entries.summer_Thu: Everyone's enjoying the weather. I wish I could too... *sigh*
Entries.fall_Thu: It's starting to get cold outside...#$b#Make sure to stay warm, @! I've got the heater on.
Entries.fall_Sat: I'm happy to buy whatever you produce on the farm.#$e#Yes, I do resell it for a profit... but I have to stock the shelves and such. It benefits us both.
Entries.fall_Fri: #$1 pierreMEGA#My dream is to become a proper businessman, and invest in more stores. I'd like to make Pelican Town thrive.$k#$e#Hi there. Is your farm still doing well?$h
Entries.Event_naga1: Well... Thanks for the apology, I appreciate that. Just forget you ever saw this, okay?$h#$b#...And I'll just forget that you were snooping around in my bedroom!
Entries.Event_naga2: You shouldn't have been snooping around in my bedroom in the first place! Nosy neighbors are the worst.$3

Entries.Sat6: $1 Caroline12#Pierre's a bit traditional... but he's a good man. He's ambitious, but he always puts his family first.
Entries.fall_Mon_inlaw_Abigail: Abby was taking online classes here, but I don't think her heart was really in it...#$e#She's a free spirit, like I was when I was her age. She's probably having the time of her life on your farm.$h

Entries.Pierre: Hey! How'd you get back here?$u#$b#Well, as long as you don't touch anything.
How'd you get back here?#$b#Don't touch anything, please.
Entries.Caroline: I look forward to dancing with Pierre.

Entries.Pierre: I can't believe tomorrow is fall. Ending the season with the jellyfish is always special.
I hope Caroline and Abby like the gifts I got them. Thankfully, business has been good this season so I could afford something special!$h

Entries: I bought the tastiest {2} from Pierre's shop the other day. #$b#He said that he bought it from you. I didn't know you were such a talented farmer!$h#$b#Looks like your grandpa's farm is back in business, huh?
I bought the tastiest {2} from Pierre's shop the other day. #$b#He said he bought it from you, and you made it using local ingredients. I didn't know you were such a {3} {4} chef!
I bought the tastiest {2} from Pierre's shop the other day. He said you found it while exploring the mountains. I didn't know you were such a talented forager!
